name: blogger.com - Mandriva blue (adlc)
description:
This is a style for blogger.com/blogspot.com blogs in Mandriva colors.
It hides the (slow!) sidebar widgets (except mini-chat) and displays about 95% of the pages correctly.
Don't use it if you like the bloggers sidebar widgets. 

Other styles based on the same rules set:
style 7201
style 7348

Other Mandriva blue styles:
style 6083

wikipedia.org styles: 
style 6044
style 6080
style 6083
style 6110
style 6157
style 6464
style 6594

style 6510
style 6738
style 6906
